name: star_wars
description: NodeJS dependencies for star wars project

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p build/js && npm run concat && npm run uglify && npm run sass:prod && npm run postcss:prod && npm run copy
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && mkdir -p build/js && npm run concat && npm run sass:dev && npm run postcss:dev && npm run copy
scripts.copy: npm run copy:images && npm run copy:fonts
scripts.copy:fonts: mkdir -p build/fonts && cp -r fonts/* build/fonts/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy:images: mkdir -p build/images && cp -r images/* build/images/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.lint: npm run lint-js && npm run lint-css
scripts.lint-fix: npm run lint-js-fix && npm run lint-css-fix
scripts.uglify: terser build/js/light_saber.min.js -o build/js/light_saber.min.js -c drop_console=true -m reserved=['jQuery','Drupal'] 2>/dev/null || true
